pages.text: The $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will go to the specified $(l:programming/area)Area/$, and drop the entity it is carrying, provided that it is allowed by an (optional) $(l:base_concepts/entity_filter)Entity Filter/$ specified in a connected $(l:programming/text)Text/$ widget.$(p)See also the $(l:programming/entity_import)Entity Import/$ widget.
